channel.title: Tor Browser (without Tor/Vidalia)
channel.description:
Hi guys,
I was reading the documentation and stumbled upon this link: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Other_Operating_Systems#Table
At the Whonix workstation it says:
Yes, because it uses Tor Browser (without Tor/Vidalia).
Do you have any guide/download link on how to get the Tor Browser (without Vidalia/tor)? I tried this myself but I can't seem to get it to work (the tor browser bundle without vidalia).

item.title: Tor Browser (without Tor/Vidalia)

item.title: Tor Browser (without Tor/Vidalia)
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Listed under the footnote. Try this:
https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorifyHOWTO/WebBrowsers#UseTorBrowserwithoutbundledTorNIX

(Btw on Whonix we do this using the https://github.com/Whonix/anon-ws-disable-stacked-tor package.)

Read full topic
